data.message: My husband needs help recovering his hacked account. Someone got into his profile which is normally set to private, He can not recover his account. I have tried endlessly to contact someone to help and no response. I feel like our personal information is at risk and will be contacting a lawyer about this!

replies.message: Hey Angie. If your husband can't get into his account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell him to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2gltBDk to get immediate help. You can also encourage him to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2h494BH for tips and guides to help him keep his account secure. -Joe

Mine to, they disabled my account. I submitted my appeal many times yet they didn't retrieve my account. Complete ID's with a picture of myself holding it clear and readable but still they didn't fix this issue. It's just so depressing. My family and friends is worried right now. I can't contact them I have no choice but to send again again and wait until it's done. 😔
